oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Complementary root systems in organic intercropping of vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yue, Xie
Hanne L., Kristensen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Recycling, balancing and resource management
Air and water emissions
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The deep root system of the intercrop dyers woad complemented the shallow root system of leek without jeopar- dizing leek yields. These results show perspectives for reduction of nitrate leaching from organic leek production.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Yue, Xie and Hanne L., Kristensen (2014) Complementary root systems in organic intercropping of vegetables. Poster at: FOOD festival Århus, Århus, 5.-7. Sept. 2014.
